name: Enduro (itch)
description:
Enduro

This was my first game developed at university.
I call it Enduro, just like the original game.
It was developed in C along with Allegro library.
The main ideia was reproducing the game style of Enduro.

HAVE FUN!

Developed by Lucas Marinho.
